hero.title: Teknofest Club
hero.subtitle: Innovating for Tomorrow
hero.description: A student-led initiative dedicated to participating in Teknofest competitions and fostering innovation in technology.

about.title: About Teknofest Club
about.description: We are a dedicated community of students passionate about technology and innovation. Our club focuses on developing projects for Teknofest, Turkey's largest technology and aerospace festival.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover the innovative projects our teams are working on for Teknofest competitions.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Stay updated with our latest events and activities.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Get to know the dedicated members behind our innovative projects.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide students with hands-on experience in technology projects and prepare them for Teknofest competitions, while fostering innovation, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2020, Teknofest Club has grown from a small group of passionate students to a thriving community of innovators, with multiple successful entries in Teknofest competitions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We encourage creative thinking and novel approaches to technological challenges.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and knowledge sharing.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for high-quality results in all our endeavors.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: We foster a culture of curiosity and lifelong learning.

events.title: Expansion
events.description: Grew to 50+ members across multiple teams.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Explore the innovative projects our teams have been working on for Teknofest competitions.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the dedicated individuals who make our club successful.

join.title: Join Our Club
join.description: We're always looking for passionate students to join our team. Fill out the form below to express your interest.

form.name: Full Name
form.why: Why do you want to join?
form.success: Application submitted successfully! We'll contact you soon.
form.error: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again.

robotics.name: Robotics Team
robotics.description: Design and build robots for various competitions.

ai.name: AI & Software Team
ai.description: Develop intelligent algorithms and software solutions.

uav.name: UAV Team
uav.description: Create unmanned aerial vehicles for different challenges.

design.name: Design Team
design.description: Handle the visual and user experience aspects of projects.

pr.name: PR & Marketing Team
pr.description: Manage our social media presence and community outreach.

events.title: News & Events
events.description: Stay updated with our latest activities, workshops, and competitions.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Visual memories from our workshops, competitions, and team activities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions? Get in touch with us using the form below or through our social media channels.
